      • select

        @Select(value="SELECT refreshToken FROM user_token WHERE userID = #{userID}")
java.lang.String select(java.lang.String userID)

        @Insert(value="INSERT INTO user_token(userID, refreshToken, time) VALUES(#{userID}, #{refreshToken}, #{time})")
int insert(RefreshToken token)

      • update

        @Update(value="UPDATE user_token SET refreshToken = #{refreshToken}, time = #{time} WHERE userID = #{userID}")
int update(RefreshToken token)
